articles.title: Second North-South Defence Minister-Level Talks Close
South Side Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
South Side Delegation Leaves 
   Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- The south side's delegation with Defence Minister Kim Jang Su as chief delegate left Pyongyang today after participating in the second inter-Korean defence minister-level talks.

articles.title: Kim Yang Gon Leaves for Seoul
articles.content:
Kim Yang Gon Leaves for Seoul 
   Pyongyang, November 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yang Gon, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and his party left here today to visit Seoul.
